languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, как же вас видеть отрадно! Я чуть было с ума не свихнулась, когда вы пропали. Все это время на стимуляторах и рекафе сидела, не спала почти, все шепотки слушала, пытаясь понять как вас найти. Я себя такой бессильной чувствовала только один раз прежде, когда Леди Теодора..." {n}Идира запинается.{/n} "Простите, что-то я несу невесть что тут".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, как же вас видеть отрадно со всеми конечностями на месте! Я чуть было с ума не свихнулась, когда вы пропали, думала, что вы все, того, концы отдали с концами. Я все это время на стимуляторах и рекафе сидела, не спала почти, все шепотки слушала, пытаясь понять как вас найти. Думала у меня скоро рожа как у Главного кормчего Равора нашего станет бледная и кислая!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, как же вас видеть отрадно! Я чуть было с ума не свихнулась, когда вы пропали. Все это время на стимуляторах и рекафе сидела, не спала почти, все шепотки слушала, пытаясь понять как вас найти. Я себя такой бессильной чувствовала только один раз прежде, когда Леди Теодора..." {n}Идира запинается.{/n} "Простите, что-то я несу невесть что тут".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, how I'm glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaff, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，真高兴又见到你了！当你突然消失的时候，我差点就发疯了。那个时候，我靠兴奋剂和雷卡咖啡勉强度日。我几乎没有睡过觉，日日夜夜地聆听那些低语，寻找关于你的蛛丝马迹。在这之前，我唯一一次感到这么无能为力，还是在西奥多拉夫人……”{n}她突然住了口。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人，我又在胡说八道了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，真高兴又见到你了！当你突然消失的时候，我差点就发疯了。那个时候，我靠兴奋剂和雷卡咖啡勉强度日。我几乎没有睡过觉，日日夜夜地聆听那些低语，寻找关于你的蛛丝马迹。在这之前，我唯一一次感到这么无能为力，还是在西奥多拉夫人……”{n}她突然住了口。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人，我又在胡说八道了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, me alegro muchísimo de verl{mf|e|a}! Casi me vuelvo loca cuando desapareció. Sobrevivía a base de estimulantes y café y apenas dormía para poder seguir escuchando a los susurros en busca de alguna pista sobre su paradero. Solo me he sentido así de impotente cuando lady Theodora...». {n}Se detiene.{/n} «Disculpe, Lord Capitán, no digo más que tonterías».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, me alegro muchísimo de verl{mf|e|a}! Casi me vuelvo loca cuando desapareció. Sobrevivía a base de estimulantes y café y apenas dormía para poder seguir escuchando a los susurros en busca de alguna pista sobre su paradero. Solo me he sentido así de impotente cuando lady Theodora...». {n}Se detiene.{/n} «Disculpe, Lord Capitán, no digo más que tonterías».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich bin so froh, Euch zu sehen! Ich wäre fast wahnsinnig geworden, als Ihr einfach verschwunden seid. Ich habe mich nur mit Stimulanzien und Rekaf über Wasser gehalten und kaum geschlafen. Damit ich im Flüstern nach Hinweisen lauschen kann, wie ich Euch finden kann. So machtlos habe ich mich bisher nur einmal gefühlt, als Lady Theodora ..." {n}Sie bricht ab.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, ich rede Unsinn."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich bin so froh, Euch zu sehen! Ich wäre fast wahnsinnig geworden, als Ihr einfach verschwunden seid. Ich habe mich nur mit Stimulanzien und Rekaf über Wasser gehalten und kaum geschlafen. Damit ich im Flüstern nach Hinweisen lauschen kann, wie ich Euch finden kann. So machtlos habe ich mich bisher nur einmal gefühlt, als Lady Theodora ..." {n}Sie bricht ab.{/n} "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, ich rede Unsinn."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、会えてとてもうれしいわ！陛下があたいの前から姿を消した時は、気が狂いそうにだったの。それ依頼、刺激薬と模造コーヒーで日々をしのぎながら、ほとんど眠らずに陛下を見つける手がかりを求めて囁き声に耳を傾けていたのよ。こんなに無力だと感じたのは、シオドーラ様の時以来で…」{n}そこで彼女は言葉を止めた。{/n}「ごめんなさい、無駄話をしてしまったわ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、会えてとてもうれしいわ！陛下があたいの前から姿を消した時は、気が狂いそうにだったの。それ依頼、刺激薬と模造コーヒーで日々をしのぎながら、ほとんど眠らずに陛下を見つける手がかりを求めて囁き声に耳を傾けていたのよ。こんなに無力だと感じたのは、シオドーラ様の時以来で…」{n}そこで彼女は言葉を止めた。{/n}「ごめんなさい、無駄話をしてしまったわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis si heureuse de vous voir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! J'ai failli devenir folle quand vous vous êtes {mf|volatilisé|volatilisée}. Alors, je me suis bourrée de stimulants et de café pour ne plus dormir afin de pouvoir écouter les murmures en quête de toute information vous concernant. Je ne m'étais plus sentie aussi impuissante depuis que dame Théodora... {n}dit-elle avant de s'interrompre.{/n} Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ce que je raconte n'a ni queue ni tête. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis si heureuse de vous voir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! J'ai failli devenir folle quand vous vous êtes {mf|volatilisé|volatilisée}. Alors, je me suis bourrée de stimulants et de café pour ne plus dormir afin de pouvoir écouter les murmures en quête de toute information vous concernant. Je ne m'étais plus sentie aussi impuissante depuis que dame Théodora... {n}dit-elle avant de s'interrompre.{/n} Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ce que je raconte n'a ni queue ni tête. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, seni gördüğüme çok sevindim! Ortadan kaybolduğunda aklımı kaybedeceğimi sandım. Seni nasıl bulacağıma dair bir ipucu yakalarım diye fısıltıları dinlemek üzere uyarıcı ve kahfe alıp durdum, neredeyse hiç uyumadım. En son bu kadar güçsüz hissettiğimde Leydi Theodora..." {n}İdira duraksıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Saçmalamaya başladım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I'm so glad to see you! I nearly lost it when you up and disappeared on me. I was getting by on stimulants and recaf, I barely slept, all so I could keep listening to the whispers for any clue on how to find you. The only other time I felt so powerless was when Lady Theodora..." {n}She stops.{/n} "Pardon me, Lord Captain, I'm talking nonsense."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, seni gördüğüme çok sevindim! Ortadan kaybolduğunda aklımı kaybedeceğimi sandım. Seni bulabilmek için bir ipucu yakalarım diye fısıltıları dinlemek için uyarıcılar ve kahfeyle günü geçiriyordum, neredeyse hiç uyumuyordum. En son bu kadar güçsüz hissettiğimde Leydi Theodora..." {n}İdira duraksıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Saçmalamaya başladım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
